price: Na hali Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye aliye kuumbeni nyinyi na hivyo mnavyo vifanya!
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye aliye kuumbeni, na akayaumba hata hayo masanamu mnayo yaunda kwa mikono yenu. Basi Yeye peke yake ndiye Mwenye kustahiki kuabudiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
